snippet: The day’s most interesting number on Friday was 13,275.20, the closing price of the Dow Jones industrial average, which left it just shy of its highest close since the financial crisis.
abstract: The day’s most interesting number on Friday was 13,275.20, the closing price of the Dow Jones industrial average, which left it just shy of its highest close since the financial crisis.

headline.main: Aug. 17: Does a Bullish Stock Market Predict a Faster Recovery?
